summary: A Lydia remake which removes her horribly stiff-looking face and replaces it with a nice, human one.
descriptionHtml:
1. What this mod does.
[list][*]gives her imperial plate armor and a steel battleaxe
[*]makes lydia look like this [img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27362-3-1353777025.jpg[/img]
[/list]

2. Mods I use/mods used to make Lydia look how she does in the pics
Face: I\'m a bit embrarassed to say that I do not know.
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722 by LogRaam
Body: UNPB http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899 by calyps
Body Texture: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24318 by HoneyVanity

[color=red][b]Note: The mods listed are not necessary to make this one work.[/b][/color]


3. Installation/Uninstallation
Add the files to/ remove them from the \"... > skyrim > data\" folder.
author: Slitheren 20

files.name: Lydia Redone Main File with facegen
